content.rendered:
Directed by Michael Uppendahl. Jennifer Getzinger. Ben Semanoff. Tara Nicole Weyr.

Written by Nick Antosca. Nick Antosca. Elise Brown. Elise Brown. Robin Veith. Robin Veith. Robin Veith. Robin Veith. Brett Johnson. David Matthews.

Cast  Melanie Lynskey( Betty Gore ) . Pablo Schreiber( Allan Gore ) . Timothy Simons( Pat Montgomery ) . RaÃºl Esparza( Don Crowder ) . Jessie Mueller( Sherry Cleckler ) . Coley Campany( Linda ) . Sharon Conley( Sandra Lockett / … ) . Aven Lotz( Becky Montgomery ) . Dash McCloud( Jason Montgomery ) . Jamie Anne Allman( Elaine ) . Antonella Rose( Christina Gore ) . Tim Ware( Judge Ryan ) . Russell Thomas( Jeffery Lockett / … ) . Adam Bartley( Richard ) . Jesse Gallegos( Robert Udashen ) . Bruce McKinnon( Jerry ) . Jose Miguel Vasquez( Lester Gayler ) . Jason Ritter( Deputy Denny Reese ) . Jordan Patrick( Reverend Ron ) . Annie Cook( Mrs. Pomeroy ) . Rick Espaillat( Bob Pomeroy ) . Jack Landry( Tom Cleckler ) . Jaclyn White( Spectator Journalist News reporter ) . Sunkrish Bala( Sid ) . Selena Anduze( Jackie Ponder ) . Jason Davis( Jack Barton ) . Hudson Hughes( Davey ) . Norio Nishimura( ADA Schultz ) . Jayson Warner Smith( DA O’Connell ) . Liz McGeever( Mary Lou Barton ) . Lauren Halperin( Tommy ) . Preston James Hillier( Chuck ) . Kathrine Barnes( Mother ) . Robert Mello( Earl ) . Luis R. Hernandez( Allan’s Boss ) . Sara Lynn Holbrook( Waitress ) . Madison Bello( Young Candy ) . Alex Mitchell( DFW Bank Teller ) . Peyton Waldrep( Girl ) . Elisabeth Lewis Corley( Don’s Mother ) . Billie Roy( Kimmy ) . Mallory Hoff( Journalist ) . Daniel Pransky( Desk Clerk ) . Shaun Michael Lynch( Deputy Dave ) . Javier Vazquez Jr.( Jury Foreman ) . Aaron K Smalls( News Anchor ) . Tom Nacy Warner( Psychiatrist ) . Ed Sturdivant( Allan’s Friend ) . Leanny L Lopez( Spectator ) . Justin Timberlake( Deffibaugh (uncredited) ) . Kevin Brown( Allan’s Co-worker (uncredited) ) . Arrianna Leigh( Church Member (uncredited) ) . Sarah Cool( Courtroom Observer (uncredited) ) . Jay D. Kacho( Juror #2 (uncredited) ) . Ernest Owens( Court spectator (uncredited) ) . Jaci Ruffley( Church Member (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Lisa Albert. Nick Antosca. Jim Atkinson. Jessica Biel. John Bloom. Megan Driscoll. Mitch Engel. Alex Hedlund. Brett Johnson. David Matthews. Michelle Purple. Jennifer Radzikowski. Lynn Stevenson. Michael Uppendahl. Robin Veith.

Production 20th Television. Eat the Cat. Iron Ocean Films.

Creator Nick Antosca. Robin Veith.

Number of Seasons 1

Number of Episodes 5

Status Finished (2022–2022)
